metadata.name: Potential Ransomware or Unauthorized MBR Tampering Via Bcdedit.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects potential malicious and unauthorized usage of bcdedit.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\bcdedit.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('bcdedit.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('delete')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('deletevalue')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('import')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('safeboot')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('network'))))

output.summary: Detects potential malicious and unauthorized usage of bcdedit.exe
